-- | Suite of general utility scripts I use to navigate life.
--   
--   Please see README.md
@package jle-utils
@version 0.1.0.0

module JUtils.GHPages
ghPagesRef :: Text
updatePages :: (MonadMask m, MonadLogger m, MonadIO m, MonadBaseControl IO m) => FilePath -> FilePath -> m ()
getPagesRef :: (MonadGit r m, MonadLogger m, MonadThrow m) => m (Oid r)
buildPagesTree :: (MonadResource m, MonadIO m, MonadLogger m, MonadGit r m) => FilePath -> FilePath -> TreeT r m ()
